title: It would be a scandal for John Bercow to be awarded a peerage
text:
For those who have accused John Bercow of harassment or abuse, Parliament’s new independent complaints process sadly comes too late. Before now, it was impossible for former members of the parliamentary community to pursue complaints about bullying or harassment by others in Parliament. Complaints about incidents pre-dating 2017 were also not admissable. It is welcome that they now are, and it will make a difference to Parliament, where senior figures have been accused of inexcusable behaviour for too long. Bercow, however, stands down as Speaker this week.
